alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Hot Spring; Perry; Pulaski; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:14PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Perry, Garland, western Saline, south central Yell, southeastern Montgomery, northwestern Hot Spring and northwestern Pulaski Counties through 1100 PM CST... At 1013 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Jessieville to near Lake Ouachita State Park to near Meyers. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Perryville... Mountain Pine... Houston... Lonsdale... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Meyers... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Rockwell... Wye Mountain... Hot Springs National Park... Williams Junction... Bigelow... Avant... Antioch in Perry County... Oaklawn Racetrack... Mt Tabor... Sunshine... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Hot Spring; Perry; Pulaski; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest
